long_description: The camo design on the men's Smith Forum Polarized Sunglasses could let you hide in the tropical jungle-or stand out in the urban jungle. Polarized polycarbonate lenses cut glare, reduce eye fatigue and are highly impact resistant. Blocks 100% of harmful UV rays and 85% of visible light. Hydrophilic Megol nose and temple pads gently yet securely grip the face, and grip even better when wet. Base 8 lens curvature gives you peripheral coverage. Smith Forum Polarized Sunglasses provide a medium fit and medium coverage.
short_description: The camo design on the men's Smith Forum Polarized Sunglasses could let you hide in the tropical jungle-or stand out in the urban jungle.
